function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusivity leading to high heterogeneity across studies","Impact":"Difficulty in comparing and synthesizing results","Mitigation":"Standardization of study designs and inclusion criteria","Technologies":"Data analysis and meta-analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Stronger associations between greenspace exposure and health outcomes for low socioeconomic status groups","Impact":"Increased disparity in health outcomes based on socioeconomic status","Mitigation":"Targeted interventions, equitable greenspace distribution","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Low socioeconomic status groups, public health professionals","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Neighbourhood greenness decreasing the effect of income deprivation on mortality","Impact":"Masking of socioeconomic disparities in health outcomes","Mitigation":"Addressing root causes of income deprivation, equitable access to healthcare","Technologies":"Healthcare access mapping tools, socioeconomic disparity analysis tools","People":"Low-income communities, public health professionals","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"}]}
